English: Dominion: Shields you once. Upon disappearing remove bullets in a large radius.
Japanese: Dominion: Charge up a slice by#200 for every primary hit.

Japanese: Paradox Barrier: When standing still, shields you from damage once. When moving, deal#20% more damage.

English: Inferno: Afflicted enemies take#5% more damage. Deals damage upon wearing off,#half the damage of the hit that applied superburn.
